TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiView extends System.Web.UI.Control

summary.span: 表示的控件用作一组 控件的容器。

span.span: Represents a control that acts as a container for a group of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是一组容器控件。The control is a container for a group of controls. 它允许您定义的一组控件，其中每个控件包含子控件。It allows you to define a group of controls, where each control contains child controls. 你的应用程序随后可以呈现特定控件添加到客户端基于条件，例如查询字符串参数中传递的用户标识、 用户首选项和信息。Your application can then render a specific control to the client based on criteria such as user identity, user preferences, and information passed in a query-string parameter. 你还可以使用控件创建向导。You can also use the control to create wizards. 在此方案中，每个中包含的控件控件表示不同的单步或在向导中的页。In this scenario, each control contained in a control represents a different step or page in the wizard. 你还应使用此控件开发多个屏幕应用程序的移动设备。You should also use this control to develop multiple-screen applications for mobile devices. 此控件可提供与 ASP.NET 移动相同的功能.NET Framework 1.1 版中的控件。This control provides the same functionality as the ASP.NET mobile control in .NET Framework version 1.1. 只有一个一次的控件可以定义为中的活动视图控件。Only one control at a time can be defined as the active view within a control. 当控件定义为活动视图，它包含的子控件呈现给客户端。When a control is defined as the active view, the child controls that it contains are rendered to the client. 你可以使用属性或方法用来定义活动的视图。You can use either the property or the method to define the active view. 如果属性为空，控件不向客户端呈现任何内容。If the property is empty, the control does not render any content to the client. 如果活动的视图设置为中不存在控件，在运行时引发。If the active view is set to a that does not exist within the control, an is raised at run time. 你可以以声明方式或以编程方式定义活动的视图。You can define the active view declaratively or programmatically. 设置属性以声明方式在定义控制原因控件设置为活动视图呈现到客户端第一个时间调用控件。Setting the property declaratively when you define the control causes the control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the control is called. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置属性以声明方式。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property declaratively. ``` ``` 设置属性以编程方式，或调用方法，允许应用程序来确定哪些控件呈现给客户端在运行时基于条件，例如用户的标识或首选项。Setting the property programmatically, or calling the method, allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or preferences. 若要允许用户之间导航内控制控件，你可以添加或控制对每个控件。To allow users to navigate between controls within a control, you can add a or control to each control. 若要利用控件的自动更新的当前处于活动状态，将其设置`CommandName`上的按钮或链接按钮之一的对应于所需的以下命令名称字段的值的属性导航行为： ， ， ，或。To take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the currently active , set the `CommandName` property on the button or link button to the value of one of the following command-name fields that corresponds to the desired navigation behavior: , , , or . ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个基本的调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件是一个单独的调查的问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 当用户单击**上一步**按钮在任何页上，属性是递减为导航到上一个控件。When the user clicks the **Previous** button on any page, the property is decremented to navigate to the previous control. 当用户单击**下一步**按钮在任何页上，属性将递增，以导航到下一步控件。When the user clicks the **Next** button on any page, the property is incremented to navigate to the next control. > [!NOTE] > 以下代码示例使用单文件代码模式，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewindexvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建基本包含三个控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a basic control that contains three controls. 用户从列表框中选择该视图将设置为活动的视图和向用户显示。The view that the user selects from the list box is set to the active view and displayed to the user. 有关的更多详细示例控制，请参阅本主题中提供的其他代码示例。For a more detailed example of the control, see the other code examples provided in this topic. [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example 2/VB/multiviewclass2vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何创建包含三个控件控件。The following code example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. A控件不具有任何样式属性。A control does not have any style properties. 因此，每个控件包含控制选项可允许样式上设置控件。Therefore, each control contains a control to allow styles to be set on the control. 首次加载页时，`DefaultView`被设置为活动视图使用方法。The first time the page is loaded, the `DefaultView` is set as the active view using the method. 每个控件包含链接按钮使用户能够导航到不同视图。Each control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views. [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example/VB/multiviewclass1vb.aspx#1)]

.event class System.EventHandler ActiveViewChanged
Public Custom Event ActiveViewChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件的活动 控件在两次服务器发送间发生更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the active control of a control changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时活动控件中控制发往服务器之间的更改。The event is raised when the active control within a control changes between posts to the server. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 当活动视图更改中，显示一条消息是在页上的控件。When the active view changes, a message is displayed in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的活动 控件的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the active control within a control.

value.span: 控件的活动 控件的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the active control within a control.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示没有任何视图设置为活动视图。

span.span: The default is -1, indicating that no view is set as active.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来设置控件中控件作为活动视图。Use the property to set a control within a control as the active view. 你还可以使用此属性返回的索引当前被设置为活动的视图的控件。You can also use this property to return the index of the control that is currently set as the active view. 索引控件由顺序确定它在声明中控件。The index of a control is determined by the order in which it is declared within a control. 例如，第一个控件中声明控件具有索引为 0。For example, the first control declared within a control has an index of 0. 只有一个一次的控件可以定义为活动内控件。Only one control at a time can be defined as active within a control. 控件设置为属性将呈现给客户端。The control that is set to the property will be rendered to the client. 如果属性设置为中不存在控件，在运行时引发。If the property is set to a that does not exist within the control, a is raised at run time. 如果该属性为空，控件不向客户端呈现任何内容。If the property is empty, the control does not render any content to the client. 你可以设置属性以声明方式在开发时或在运行时以编程方式。You can set the property either declaratively at development time or programmatically at run time. 设置属性以声明方式在定义控制原因控件设置为活动视图呈现到客户端第一个时间调用控件。Setting the property declaratively when you define the control causes the control that is set as the active view to render to the client the first time the control is called. 设置属性以编程方式允许应用程序来确定哪些控件呈现给客户端在运行时基于条件，例如用户的标识或他们的首选项。Setting the property programmatically allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity or their preferences. 或者，可以使用和方法来设置或获取的活动视图控件。Alternately, you can use the and methods to set or get the active view within the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个基本的调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件是一个单独的调查的问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 当用户单击**上一步**按钮在任何页上，属性是递减为导航到上一个控件。When the user clicks the **Previous** button on any page, the property is decremented to navigate to the previous control. 当用户单击**下一步**按钮在任何页上，属性将递增，以导航到下一步控件。When the user clicks the **Next** button on any page, the property is incremented to navigate to the next control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewindexcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewIndex Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewindexvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的索引设置为小于 -1，或大于等于列表项的数目。

span.span: The specified index was set to less than -1, or greater than or equal to the number of items on the list.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否向 控件应用主题。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether themes apply to the control.

value.span: 如果使用主题，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if themes are to be used; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否为启用主题控件。The property indicates whether themes are enabled for the control. 是否为中包含的控件启用主题属性还会影响其集合。The property also affects whether themes are enabled for the controls contained in its collection. 当属性是`true`，应用程序的主题目录中搜索要应用的控件外观。When the property is `true`, the application's theme directory is searched for control skins to apply. 如果用于特定的控件中的主题目录存在，则不会应用的外观。If no skin for the particular control exists in the theme directory, a skin is not applied. 当属性是`false`，则不搜索主题目录和内容不使用属性。When the property is `false`, the theme directory is not searched and the contents of the property are not used. 控件可以重写值由其父控件或包含的页的设置。A control can override the value set by its parent control or the containing page. 例如，如果控件具有设置为`false`，可以有选择地将主题应用于单个中包含的控件通过设置属性`true`上各个子控件。For example, if a control has set to `false`, you can selectively apply themes to individual controls contained within the control by setting the property to `true` on the individual child controls.

summary.span: 返回 控件的当前活动 控件。

span.span: Returns the current active control within a control.

returns.span: 控件，表示 控件的活动视图。

span.span: A control that represents the active view within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法返回控件中当前被设置为活动的视图的控件。Use this method to return the control within a control that is currently set as the active view. 此方法返回控制，因此可以用于访问活动的视图的属性。This method returns a control and therefore can be used to access the properties of the active view. 例如，`MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID`返回的值MultiView1 中的当前活动视图的属性。For example, `MultiView1.GetActiveView.ID` returns the value of the property of the current active view in MultiView1. 或者，可以使用属性来获取或设置当前活动视图中的从零开始索引控件。Alternately, you can use the property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a control. 以声明方式或以编程方式，可以访问此属性。This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建包含三个控件控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 当引发事件时，方法用于返回当前活动视图，并将其显示在页上的控件。When the event is raised, the method is used to return the current active view and display it in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 表示要显示在 控件中、与下一个 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with the next control to display in a control.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示"NextView"命令名称。Use the field to represent the "NextView" command name. 你可以使用此字段的值以利用控件的自动更新的活动控件。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控件包含控件导航到上一个，你可以设置属性的值字段，它是"NextView"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the previous , you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "NextView". 这将导致控件自动递减的值属性时单击该按钮。This causes the control to automatically decrement the value of the property when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个基本的调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件是一个单独的调查的问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供在上一个和下一步之间自动导航调查中的控件。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时活动控件中控制发送到服务器，操作之间的更改，你可以为此事件提供自定义处理程序。The event is raised when the active control within a control changes between posts to the server, and you can provide a custom handler for this event. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何指定和代码的事件处理程序事件控件。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code an event handler for the event of a control. 当活动视图更改中，显示一条消息是在页上的控件。When the active view changes, a message is displayed in a control on the page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/cs/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.ActiveViewChanged Event Example/VB/multiviewactiveviewchangedeventvb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件包含引发事件的控件。A control contains controls that raise events. 此方法重写基实现来处理之间的导航控件。This method overrides the base implementation to handle navigation between controls.

exception.span: 控件无法找到 的 属性中指定的 。

span.span: The control cannot find the specified in the property of .

exception.span: 无法将 的 属性作为整数进行分析。

span.span: The property of cannot be parsed as an integer.

protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此方法通知控件必须执行任何所需创建并设置实例的初始化步骤。When notified by this method, a control must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此阶段的服务器控件的生命周期中，控件的视图状态尚未填充。In this stage of the server control's lifecycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 你无法访问另一个服务器控件时调用此方法时，即使它是子还是此控件的父级。You cannot access another server control when this method is called, even if it is a child or parent of this control. 其他服务器控件也不一定能够将创建并可供访问。Other server controls are not certain to be created and ready for access.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly string PreviousViewCommandName;
.field public static initonly string PreviousViewCommandName
Public Shared ReadOnly PreviousViewCommandName As String
public: static initonly System::String ^ PreviousViewCommandName;

summary.span: 表示要显示在 控件中、与上一个 控件关联的命令名。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with the previous control to display in a control.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示"PrevView"命令名称。Use the field to represent the "PrevView" command name. 你可以使用此字段的值以利用控件的自动更新的活动控件。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控件包含导航到下一个控件，你可以设置属性的值字段，它是"PrevView"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the next , you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "PrevView". 这将导致控制时自动递增的值属性时单击该按钮。This causes the control to automatically increment the value of the property when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个基本的调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件是一个单独的调查的问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供在上一个和下一步之间自动导航调查中的控件。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/CS/multiview.nextviewcommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.NextViewCommandName#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.NextViewCommandName/VB/multiview.nextviewcommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法之后，立即调用控件移除从集合控件。The method is called immediately after a control is removed from the collection of a control.

summary.span: 将 控件内容写入指定的 对象，以便在客户端显示。

span.span: Writes the control content to the specified object, for display on the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生从自定义类时，主要由控件开发人员使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom class from the control. 方法将写入使用所提供的客户端所呈现的内容的活动视图。The method writes the rendered content of the active view to the client using the supplied . 你可以在设置活动视图控制使用方法或属性。You can set the active view in a control using the method or the property. 你可以确定哪种中控制集合是活动的视图中，如果有的话，通过使用方法或属性。You can determine which one of the controls in the collection is the active view, if any, by using the method or the property. 如果活动视图设置为控制，活动控件用于呈现该视图及其子控件的内容。If an active view is set for the control, the active control is used to render content for that view and its child controls. 如果没有为设置活动视图没有内容时呈现控件， 。If an active view is not set for the control, no content is rendered to the .

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveControlState() cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function SaveControlState () As Object
protected public: override System::Object ^ SaveControlState();

summary.span: 保存 控件的当前状态。

span.span: Saves the current state of the control.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示 控件的状态。

returns.span: 如果 控件没有任何关联视图状态，则此方法返回 。

span.span: If there is no state associated with the control, this method returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetActiveView (System.Web.UI.WebControls.View view);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetActiveView(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.View view) cil managed
public: void SetActiveView(System::Web::UI::WebControls::View ^ view);

param.name: view
param.span: 控件中要设置为活动视图的 控件。

span.span: A control to set as the active view within a control.

summary.span: 将指定的 控件设置为 控件的活动视图。

span.span: Sets the specified control to the active view within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法设置控件中控件作为活动视图。Use this method to set a control within a control as the active view. 只有一个一次的控件可以定义为活动内控件。Only one control at a time can be defined as active within a control. 中被设置为活动视图呈现给客户端的控件。The control that is set as the active view is rendered to the client. 如果中不存在的控件控件设置为活动状态，则在运行时引发异常。If a control that does not exist within the control is set as active, an exception is raised at run time. 如果没有控件设置为活动的视图，控件不向客户端呈现任何内容。If no control is set as the active view, the control does not render any content to the client. 使用方法以编程方式设置活动视图允许应用程序来确定哪些控件呈现给客户端在运行时基于用户的标识和首选项等条件。Using the method to programmatically set the active view allows the application to determine which control to render to the client at run time based on criteria such as a user's identity and preferences. 或者，可以使用属性来获取或设置当前活动视图中的从零开始索引控件。Alternately, you can use the property to get or set the zero-based index of the current active view in a control. 以声明方式或以编程方式，可以访问此属性。This property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建包含三个控件控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control that contains three controls. 首次加载页时，`DefaultView`被设置为活动视图使用方法。The first time the page is loaded, the `DefaultView` is set as the active view using the method. 每个控件包含链接按钮使用户能够导航到不同视图。Each control contains link buttons to allow the user to navigate to different views. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView Class Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView Class Example/VB/multiviewclass1vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的 参数值未包含在 控件中。

span.span: The specified parameter value was not contained in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static readonly string SwitchViewByIDCommandName;
.field public static initonly string SwitchViewByIDCommandName
Public Shared ReadOnly SwitchViewByIDCommandName As String
public: static initonly System::String ^ SwitchViewByIDCommandName;

summary.span: 表示一个命令名，该命令名与根据指定的 ID 更改 控件中的活动 控件关联。此字段为只读。

span.span: Represents the command name associated with changing the active control in a control, based on a specified id. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示"SwitchViewByID"命令名称。Use the field to represent the "SwitchViewByID" command name. 你可以使用此字段的值以利用控件的自动更新的活动控件。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控件包含控件导航到第一个单击时，你可以设置属性的值字段，它是"SwitchViewByID"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the first when clicked, you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "SwitchViewByID". 设置属性设置为第一个 ID中的控制权，例如"页 1"。Set the property to the ID of the first in the control, such as "Page1". 这将导致控件自动将"页 1"设置为活动时单击该按钮。This causes the control to automatically set "Page1" as the active when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个基本的调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件是一个单独的调查的问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供在上一个和下一步之间自动导航调查中的控件。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. 如果用户单击**重新拍摄调查**中最后一个按钮调查的字段用于"页 1"的命令参数以及将用户重定向回第一个调查。If the user clicks the **Retake Survey** button in the last of the survey, the field is used along with a command argument of "Page1" to redirect the user back to the first of the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用字段来表示"SwitchViewByIndex"命令名称。Use the field to represent the "SwitchViewByIndex" command name. 你可以使用此字段的值以利用控件的自动更新的活动控件。You can use the value of this field to take advantage of the control's automatic updating of the active control. 例如，如果控件包含控件导航到第一个单击时，你可以设置属性的值字段，它是"SwitchViewByIndex"。For example, if a control contains a control that navigates to the first when clicked, you can set the property to the value of the field, which is "SwitchViewByIndex". 设置的第一个索引属性中控件，则为 0。Set the property to the index of the first in the control, which is 0. 这将导致控件自动设置属性设为 0 时单击该按钮。This causes the control to automatically set the property to 0 when the button is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个基本的调查。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control to create a basic survey. 每个控件是一个单独的调查的问题。Each control is a separate survey question. 和字段用于提供在上一个和下一步之间自动导航调查中的控件。The and fields are used to provide automatic navigation between the previous and next controls in the survey. 如果用户单击**重新拍摄调查**中最后一个按钮调查的字段使用 0 的命令参数以及将用户重定向回第一个调查。If the user clicks the **Retake Survey** button in the last of the survey, the field is used along with a command argument of 0 to redirect the user back to the first of the survey. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式管理中控制控件。Use this property to programmatically manage the controls in a control. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式添加控件添加到控件。The following example demonstrates how to programmatically add controls to a control. 在每行后创建控件，`MultiView.Views.Add()`语法用于添加控制转移到集合控件。After each control is created, the `MultiView.Views.Add()` syntax is used to add the control to the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，并可能无法正常工作如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空白文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-vb[MultiView.Views Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MultiView.Views Example/VB/multiviewviewsvb.aspx#1)]
